content: is this the branch: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync

author: agnxsh

author: agnxsh
content: Yes

author: g11tech
content:
```yaml
participants:
# Super nodes
  - cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params: [--persistNetworkIdentity, --supernode]
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-subnets
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-data-column-subnets
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
    cl_extra_params:
      - --p2p-subscribe-all-custody-subnets-enabled
  - cl_type: nimbus
    cl_image: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-subnets=true
      - --sync-light-client=no
# Full nodes
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
    cl_extra_params:
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
      - --data-columns-withhold-count=64
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
  - cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params: [--persistNetworkIdentity]
  - cl_type: nimbus
    cl_image: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync
    cl_extra_params:
      - --sync-light-client=no
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
    cl_max_mem: 8192
    cl_max_cpu: 8000
```
